text: Let's Make It Legal is a 1951 American romantic comedy movie directed by Richard Sale and based on the story My Mother-in-Law, Miriam by Mortimer Braus. It stars Claudette Colbert, Macdonald Carey, Zachary Scott, Barbara Bates, Marilyn Monroe, Robert Wagner and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1951 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies about divorce Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Sale
title: Let's Make It Legal
